Barak

Siang, IIT GUWAHATI

The SiangRiver meets two other major tributaries of Brahmaputra, Dibang and Lohit in the west of Sadiya, at a place named Kobo.

  • Barak
  • Brahmaputra
  • Dhansiri
  • Dibang
  • Dihing
  • Disang
  • Kameng
  • Kapili
  • Lohit
  • Manas
  • Married Scholar's hostel
  • Siang
  • Subansiri
  • Umiam
